```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% rownames_to_column() %>%
  ggplot() + geom_point(aes(mpg, qsec))
```

```{r}
library(osmdata)

install.packages('ggmap')
library(ggmap)
```

```{r}
q <- opq(bbox = 'amsterdam') %>%
    add_osm_feature(key = 'amenity', value = 'pub')

pubs_sf = q%>%
    osmdata_sf ()

pubs_sf = pubs_sf %>% sf::st_as_sf()
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_sf(data = pubs_sf$osm_points)
```
